title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-1.6 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-1.6 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements

State Regulations

Facilities registered and permitted pursuant to this Part
must: (a) Keep records as required by
section
360.19
(k) of this

Title. (b) Submit an annual report
as required by section
360.19
(k)(3)
of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
361-1.6

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
